form.p: This template will create a bndrun file for launching the gRPC Health Example Consumer.
Source code repo for the distribution provider and both the server and client for
The project source code for this consumer is located here
If the gRPC Health Example Server is running, after a few seconds the endpoint description will be
discovered via the Zeroconf Discovery and the gRPC remote service will be injected and and then called,
producing output like this to the console:
g! got health check response=status: SERVING
